title: Behind The Idea #14: Landmark and Beating The High Yield Trap
description:
Landmark's model came under scrutiny in an article by new SA contributor Alacran Investments (https://seekingalpha.com/article/4164640-beware-landmark-infrastructure-partners-lp). A lot of high-yield models may come up for scrutiny as the interest rate cycle turns. What does that mean for income investors? We look at how to avoid the high yield trap this week.
Topics covered:

What is Landmark's model, exactly? (1:45 minute mark)
Definition of terms - MLPs vs. REITs vs. triple-net-leases (4:10)
Mike explain
